name: MakeMomentsMatterAMusicEducationPodcast
0:
”Alexa, open Make Moments Matter Podcast”
”Alexa, start Make Moments Matter Podcast”
”Alexa, ask Make Moments Matter Podcast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: make moments matter podcast
Developer Terms of Use
des:
I love teaching music to kids! I am a certified Orff Schulwerk teacher and plan to share lessons about singing, playing instruments, recorder technique, creative movement, improvisation, guided listening, any other techniques that will help you teach music better! Find more information and ideas on my blog: www.MakeMomentsMatter.org

Here are a few quick tips when navigating our skill. The First thing to note, when opening the skill you’ll be playing the latest episode, but if that’s not what you’re looking for, you can always find something more specific. This skill allows you to play next or previous episode. In addition, you can ask the skill to play the newest or oldest episodes or if you want to get specific, play a specific episode by saying the episode number. Try some of these commands:

**Next/Previous Episode**
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, next”
— [While Episode Is Playing] = “Alexa, previous”

**Select Latest Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Make Moments Matter Podcast to play latest episode” 

**Select First Episode**
— “Alexa, ask Make Moments Matter Podcast to start from first episode”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
